title: Multiply by 1
text: The first step is to multiply the measurement to be converted by 1; write 1 as a fraction relating the units given and the units needed.

title: Relating Miles to Feet
text: The conversion from miles to feet is 1 $$mile=5280$$ feet.

title: Writing 1 as a Fraction
text: Using the relation between miles and feet, we can rewrite the 1 we multiply in the first step as (5280 feet)/(1 mile), so we get the expression (1.5 miles)*(5280 feet)/(1 mile).

title: Simplifying
text: Mile divides out, so we get the expression (1.5)*(5280 feet)/1.

title: Multiplying
text: Multiply the expression, we get the final answer 7920 feet.
